original_title: Belcanto - The Tenors of the 78 Era (Part II)
overview: In the late 1990s, film-maker Jan Schmidt-Garre created thirteen half-hour television programs about tenors who lived, sang, and recorded during der Schellackzeit â€“ the time of the 78-rpm record. Six of those programs were released on EuroArts 2050207, and the remaining seven are released here.
title: Belcanto - The Tenors of the 78 Era (Part II)
